<title

    pfs=""
>
[Muddle Through](/Feats.aspx?ID=3919) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Kingdom" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=438" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 532

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Wilderness](/Skills.aspx?ID=33)

</column>

---

Your people are independent-minded and take care of the small things around the kingdom, not letting them pile up into bigger problems. Increase two of your Ruin thresholds by 1 and one of them by 2.
name: Muddle Through
